AUTORESPONDER::DESCRIPTION: Command to interact with Pingu's custom response module.
AUTORESPONDER::OPTION:CREATE: Creates a custom response. A custom identifier can be assigned.
AUTORESPONDER::OPTION:REMOVE: Delete a custom response using its identifier.
CCMD::DESCRIPTION: Command to interact with custom server commands.
ECONOMY::DESCRIPTION: Configure the economy module in your server.
JOINROLES::DESCRIPTION: Manage the roles given to users when they join the server.
JOINROLES::OPTION:LIST: List all the roles given to users when they join the server.
JOINROLES::OPTION:ADD: Add a role to the list of roles that are given to users when they join the server.
JOINROLES::OPTION:REMOVE: Remove a role from the list of roles that are given to users when they join the server.
